00029 /*
00030  * Default constructor
00031  */
00032 CelFileData::CelFileData()
00033 {
00034         dpInten = 0;
00035         dpStdev = 0;
00036         dpPixels = 0;
00037         Clear();
00038 }
00039 
00040 /*
00041  * Constructor
00042  */
00043 CelFileData::CelFileData(const std::string &filename) 
00044 {
00045         dpInten = 0;
00046         dpStdev = 0;
00047         dpPixels = 0;
00048 
00049         Clear();
00050         SetFilename(filename);
00051         genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId(INTENSITY_DATA_TYPE);
00052         DataGroupHeader dcHdr(CelDataGroupName);
00053         genericData.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(dcHdr);
00054 }
00055 
00056 /*
00057  * Destructor
00058  */
00059 CelFileData::~CelFileData() 
00060 {
00061         Clear(); 
00062 }
00063 
00064 /*
00065  * Clear the object members.
00066  */
00067 void CelFileData::Clear()
00068 {
00069         genericData.Header().Clear();
00070         setIntensityMetaData = false;
00071         setStdDevMetaData = false;
00072         setPixelMetaData = false;
00073         setOutlierMetaData = false;
00074         setMaskMetaData = false;
00075 
00076         if (dpInten){ dpInten->Delete(); dpInten = 0; }
00077         if (dpStdev) { dpStdev->Delete(); dpStdev = 0; }
00078         if (dpPixels) { dpPixels->Delete(); dpPixels = 0; }
00079         outlierPlaneRead = false;
00080         outliers.clear();
00081         maskPlaneRead = false;
00082         masked.clear();
00083         cachedRows = -1;
00084         cachedCols = -1;
00085         intensityColumnType = -1;
00086 }

00089  * Set file name

00092 {
00093         genericData.Header().SetFilename(p);
00094 }

00101         return ((GenericData&)genericData).Header().GetFilename();

00104 void CelFileData::SetIntensityCount(int32_t ln)
00105 {
00106         DataSetHeader dpHdr;
00107         dpHdr.SetRowCnt(ln);
00108         dpHdr.SetName(CelIntensityLabel);
00109         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(CelIntensityLabel);
00110         if(setIntensityMetaData)
00111         {
00112                 UpdateDataSetRowCount(dpHdr);
00113         }
00114         else
00115         {
00116                 InsertDataSetHeader(dpHdr);
00117                 setIntensityMetaData = true;
00118         }
00119 }
00120

00126         dpHdr.AddFloatColumn(CelStdDevLabel);

00128         {
00129                 UpdateDataSetRowCount(dpHdr);

00131         else

00133                 InsertDataSetHeader(dpHdr);
00134                 setStdDevMetaData = true;

00156 {

00160         dpHdr.AddShortColumn(L"X");
00161         dpHdr.AddShortColumn(L"Y");
00162         if(setOutlierMetaData)
00163         {
00164                 UpdateDataSetRowCount(dpHdr);
00165         }
00166         else
00167         {
00168                 InsertDataSetHeader(dpHdr);
00169                 setOutlierMetaData = true;

00190 
00191 void CelFileData::UpdateDataSetRowCount(const DataSetHeader &hdr)
00192 {
00193         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00194         bool found = false;
00195         int sz = dcHdr->GetDataSetCnt();
00196         for(int i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00197         {
00198                 DataSetHeader* dpHdr = &dcHdr->GetDataSet(i);
00199                 if(dpHdr->GetName() == hdr.GetName())
00200                 {
00201                         dpHdr->SetRowCnt(hdr.GetRowCnt());
00202                         found = true;
00203                         break;
00204                 }
00205         }
00206         if(!found)
00207         {
00208                 InsertDataSetHeader(hdr);
00209         }
00210 }
00211 
00212 void CelFileData::InsertDataSetHeader(const DataSetHeader &hdr)
00213 {
00214         DataGroupHeader* dcHdr = &genericData.Header().GetDataGroup(0);
00215         dcHdr->AddDataSetHdr(hdr);
00216 }
00217 
00218 /*
00219  * Return the number of cells on the array.
00220  */
00221 int32_t CelFileData::GetNumCells()
00222 {
00223         int32_t rows = 0;
00224         try
00225         {
00226                 PrepareIntensityPlane();
00227                 if (dpInten)
00228                 {
00229                         rows = dpInten->Rows();
00230                 }
00231         }
00232         catch(CalvinException&)
00233         {
00234         }
00235         return rows;
00236 }
00237 
00238 /*
00239  * Prepare to read intensity data
00240  */
00241 void CelFileData::PrepareIntensityPlane()
00242 {
00243         if (dpInten == 0)
00244         {
00245                 dpInten = genericData.DataSet(CelDataGroupName, CelIntensityLabel);
00246                 if (dpInten)
00247                 {
00248                         dpInten->Open();
00249                         intensityColumnType = dpInten->Header().GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType();
00250                 }
00251         }
00252 }
00253 
00254 /*
00255  * Prepare to read the standard deviation data
00256  */
00257 void CelFileData::PrepareStdevPlane()
00258 {
00259         if (dpStdev == 0)
00260         {
00261                 dpStdev = genericData.DataSet(CelDataGroupName, CelStdDevLabel);
00262                 if (dpStdev)
00263                         dpStdev->Open();
00264         }
00265 }
00266 
00267 /*
00268  * Prepare to read the number of pixel data
00269  */
00270 void CelFileData::PrepareNumPixelPlane()
00271 {
00272         if (dpPixels == 0)
00273         {
00274                 dpPixels = genericData.DataSet(CelDataGroupName, CelPixelLabel);
00275                 if (dpPixels)
00276                         dpPixels->Open();
00277         }
00278 }
00279 
00280 /*
00281  * Prepare to read the outlier data
00282  */
00283 void CelFileData::PrepareOutlierPlane()
00284 {
00285         if (outlierPlaneRead)
00286                 return;
00287 
00288         outlierPlaneRead = true;        // Read attempted
00289 
00290         DataSet* dpOutlier = genericData.DataSet(CelDataGroupName, CelOutlierLabel);
00291         if (dpOutlier)
00292         {
00293                 if (dpOutlier->Open())
00294                 {
00295                         int32_t rows = dpOutlier->Rows();
00296 
00297                         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00298                         {
00299                                 int16_t x = 0, y = 0;
00300                                 dpOutlier->GetData(row, 0, x);
00301                                 dpOutlier->GetData(row, 1, y);
00302                                 XYCoord xy(x,y);
00303                                 outliers.insert(xy);
00304                         }
00305                 }
00306                 dpOutlier->Delete();
00307         }
00308 }
00309 
00310 /*
00311  * Prepare to read the mask data
00312  */
00313 void CelFileData::PrepareMaskedPlane()
00314 {
00315         if (maskPlaneRead)
00316                 return;
00317 
00318         maskPlaneRead = true;   // Read attempted
00319 
00320         DataSet* dpMasked = genericData.DataSet(CelDataGroupName, CelMaskLabel);
00321         if (dpMasked)
00322         {
00323                 if (dpMasked->Open())
00324                 {
00325                         int32_t rows = dpMasked->Rows();
00326 
00327                         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00328                         {
00329                                 int16_t x = 0, y = 0;
00330                                 dpMasked->GetData(row, 0, x);
00331                                 dpMasked->GetData(row, 1, y);
00332                                 XYCoord xy(x,y);
00333                                 masked.insert(xy);
00334                         }
00335                 }
00336                 dpMasked->Delete();
00337         }
00338 }
00339 
00340 /*
00341  * Prepare to read all data
00342  */
00343 void CelFileData::PrepareAllPlanes()
00344 {
00345         PrepareIntensityPlane();
00346         PrepareStdevPlane();
00347         PrepareNumPixelPlane();
00348         PrepareOutlierPlane();
00349         PrepareMaskedPlane();
00350 }
00351 
00352 /*
00353  * Get the cell intensity, standard deviation, number of pixels, outlier flag and mask flag.
00354  */
00355 void CelFileData::GetData(int32_t cellIdx, float& intensity, float& stdev, int16_t& numPixels, bool& outlier, bool& masked)
00356 {
00357         PrepareAllPlanes();
00358 
00359         // Index checking is done in the Generic layer
00360 
00361         if (dpInten)
00362         {
00363                 // if out-of-bounds, forward the exception
00364                 if (intensityColumnType == FloatColType)
00365                         dpInten->GetData(cellIdx, 0, intensity);
00366                 else    // try u_int16_t or throw
00367                 {
00368                         u_int16_t int16Inten;
00369                         dpInten->GetData(cellIdx, 0, int16Inten);
00370                         intensity = (float)int16Inten;
00371                 }
00372         }
00373 
00374         if (dpStdev)
00375         {
00376                 try
00377                 {
00378                         stdev = 0.0f;
00379                         if (dpStdev)
00380                         {
00381                                 if (cellIdx < dpStdev->Rows())
00382                                         dpStdev->GetData(cellIdx, 0, stdev);
00383                         }
00384                 }
00385                 catch(CalvinException&)
00386                 {
00387                         stdev = 0.0f;
00388                 }
00389         }
00390 
00391         if (dpPixels)
00392         {
00393                 try
00394                 {
00395                         numPixels = 0;
00396                         if (dpPixels)
00397                         {
00398                                 if (cellIdx < dpPixels->Rows())
00399                                         dpPixels->GetData(cellIdx, 0, numPixels);
00400                         }
00401                 }
00402                 catch(CalvinException&)
00403                 {
00404                         numPixels = 0;
00405                 }
00406         }
00407 
00408         outlier = IsOutlier(cellIdx);
00409         masked = IsMasked(cellIdx);
00410 }
00411 
00412 /*
00413  * Get the intensities for a range of cell indexes.
00414  */
00415 bool CelFileData::GetIntensities(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, FloatVector& values)
00416 {
00417         PrepareIntensityPlane();
00418         if (dpInten && dpInten->IsOpen())
00419         {
00420                 if (intensityColumnType == FloatColType)
00421                         dpInten->GetData(0, cellIdxStart, count, values);
00422                 else    // try u_int16_t or throw
00423                 {
00424                         Uint16Vector uint16Vector;
00425                         dpInten->GetData(0, cellIdxStart, count, uint16Vector);
00426                         values.resize(uint16Vector.size());
00427                         for (int32_t i = 0; i < uint16Vector.size(); ++i)
00428                                 values[i] = (float)uint16Vector[i];
00429                 }
00430 
00431                 return (count == values.size());
00432         }
00433         return false;
00434 }
00435 
00436 /*
00437  * Get the standard deviations for a range of cell indexes.
00438  */
00439 bool CelFileData::GetStdev(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, FloatVector& values)
00440 {
00441         PrepareStdevPlane();
00442         if (dpStdev && dpStdev->IsOpen())
00443         {
00444                 dpStdev->GetData(0, cellIdxStart, count, values);
00445                 return (count == values.size());
00446         }
00447         return false;
00448 }
00449 
00450 /*
00451  * Get the number of pixels for a range of cell indexes.
00452  */
00453 bool CelFileData::GetNumPixels(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, Int16Vector& values)
00454 {
00455         PrepareNumPixelPlane();
00456         if (dpPixels && dpPixels->IsOpen())
00457         {
00458                 dpPixels->GetData(0, cellIdxStart, count, values);
00459                 return (count == values.size());
00460         }
00461         return false;
00462 }
00463 
00464 /*
00465  * Get the outlier flags for a range of cell indexes.
00466  */
00467 bool CelFileData::GetOutliers(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, BoolVector& values)
00468 {
00469         PrepareOutlierPlane();
00470         if (outliers.empty())
00471                 return false;
00472 
00473         int32_t lastCell = cellIdxStart+count;
00474         if (lastCell > GetNumCells())
00475                 lastCell = GetNumCells();
00476         for (int32_t cellIdx = cellIdxStart; cellIdx < lastCell; ++cellIdx)
00477                 values.push_back(IsOutlier(cellIdx));
00478 
00479         return true;
00480 }
00481 
00482 /*
00483  * Get the mask flags for a range of cell indexes.
00484  */
00485 bool CelFileData::GetMasked(int32_t cellIdxStart, int32_t count, BoolVector& values)
00486 {
00487         PrepareMaskedPlane();
00488         if (masked.empty())
00489                 return false;
00490 
00491         int32_t lastCell = cellIdxStart+count;
00492         if (lastCell > GetNumCells())
00493                 lastCell = GetNumCells();
00494         for (int32_t cellIdx = cellIdxStart; cellIdx < lastCell; ++cellIdx)
00495                 values.push_back(IsMasked(cellIdx));
00496 
00497         return true;
00498 }
00499 
00500 /*
00501  * Get the coordinates of all outlier cells (i.e. outlier flag is true).
00502  */
00503 void CelFileData::GetOutlierCoords(XYCoordVector& coords)
00504 {
00505         PrepareOutlierPlane();
00506         //std::set<XYCoord>::iterator begin = outliers.begin();
00507         //std::set<XYCoord>::iterator end = outliers.end();
00508         for (std::set<XYCoord>::iterator ii = outliers.begin(); ii != outliers.end(); ++ii)
00509         {
00510                 XYCoord xy(ii->xCoord, ii->yCoord);
00511                 coords.push_back(xy);
00512         }
00513 }
00514 
00515 /*
00516  * Get the coordinates of all masked cells (i.e. mask flag is true).
00517  */
00518 void CelFileData::GetMaskedCoords(XYCoordVector& coords)
00519 {
00520         PrepareMaskedPlane();
00521         //std::set<XYCoord>::iterator begin = masked.begin();
00522         //std::set<XYCoord>::iterator end = masked.end();
00523         for (std::set<XYCoord>::iterator ii = masked.begin(); ii != masked.end(); ++ii)
00524         {
00525                 XYCoord xy(ii->xCoord, ii->yCoord);
00526                 coords.push_back(xy);
00527         }
00528 }

00530 /*
00531  * Indicates whether there are standard deviation values.
00532  */
00533 bool CelFileData::HasStdev()
00534 {
00535         DataSetHeader* dph = FindDataSetHeader(CelStdDevLabel);
00536         if (dph)
00537                 return (dph->GetRowCnt() > 0);
00538         return false;
00539 }
00540 
00541 /*
00542  * Indicates whether there are number of pixel values.
00543  */
00544 bool CelFileData::HasNumPixels()
00545 {
00546         DataSetHeader* dph = FindDataSetHeader(CelPixelLabel);
00547         if (dph)
00548                 return (dph->GetRowCnt() > 0);
00549         return false;
00550 }

00552 /*
00553  * Set the version of the CEL file
00554  */
00555 void CelFileData::SetVersion(u_int8_t value)
00556 {
00557         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00558         paramType.SetName(FILE_VERSION_PARAM_NAME);
00559         paramType.SetValueUInt8(value);
00560         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00561         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00562 }
00563 
00564 /*
00565  * Get the version of the CEL file
00566  */
00567 u_int8_t CelFileData::GetVersion()
00568 {
00569         u_int8_t result = 0;
00570         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00571         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00572         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(FILE_VERSION_PARAM_NAME, paramType))
00573         {
00574                 result = paramType.GetValueUInt8();
00575         }
00576         return result;
00577 }

00663 {

00667 
00668 /*
00669  * Get the number of rows of cells.
00670  */
00671 int32_t CelFileData::GetRows()
00672 {
00673         if (cachedRows == -1)
00674                 cachedRows = GetInt32FromGenericHdrParameterList(CEL_ROWS_PARAM_NAME);
00675         return cachedRows;
00676 }

00693                 cachedCols = GetInt32FromGenericHdrParameterList(CEL_COLS_PARAM_NAME);
00694         return cachedCols;

00698 /*
00699  * Read an int32_t value from the GenericDataHeader parameter list.
00700  */
00701 int32_t CelFileData::GetInt32FromGenericHdrParameterList(const std::wstring& name)
00702 {
00703         int32_t result = 0;
00704         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00705         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00706         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00707         {
00708                 result = paramType.GetValueInt32();
00709         }
00710         return result;
00711 }
00712 
00713 /*
00714  * Set a int32_t value into the GenericDataHeader parameter list.
00715  */
00716 void CelFileData::SetInt32ToGenericHdrParameterList(const std::wstring& name, int32_t value)
00717 {
00718         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00719         paramType.SetName(name);
00720         paramType.SetValueInt32(value);
00721         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00722         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00723 }

00725 /*
00726  * Read an wstring value from the GenericDataHeader parameter list.
00727  */
00728 std::wstring CelFileData::GetWStringFromGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name)
00729 {
00730         std::wstring result;
00731         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00732         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00733         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(name, paramType))
00734         {
00735                 result = paramType.GetValueText();
00736         }
00737         return result;
00738 }
00739 
00740 /*
00741  * Set a wstring value into the GenericDataHeader parameter list.
00742  */
00743 void CelFileData::SetWStringToGenericHdr(const std::wstring& name, const std::wstring value, int32_t reserve)
00744 {
00745         ParameterNameValueType paramType;
00746         paramType.SetName(name);
00747         paramType.SetValueText(value, reserve);
00748         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00749         hdr->AddNameValParam(paramType);
00750 }
00751 
00752 /*
00753  * Determines if the cell at a given index is an outlier.
00754  * Assumes that the outlier DataSet has been read
00755  */
00756 bool CelFileData::IsOutlier(int32_t cellIdx)
00757 {
00758         int16_t x, y;
00759         ComputeXY(cellIdx, x, y);
00760         XYCoord xy(x,y);
00761         return (outliers.find(xy) != outliers.end());
00762 }
00763 /*
00764  * Determines if the cell at a given index is masked.
00765  * Assumes that the masked DataSet has been read
00766  */
00767 bool CelFileData::IsMasked(int32_t cellIdx)
00768 {
00769         int16_t x, y;
00770         ComputeXY(cellIdx, x, y);
00771         XYCoord xy(x,y);
00772         return (masked.find(xy) != masked.end());
00773 }
00774 
00775 /*
00776  * Determine the x-y coordinate given a cell index.
00777  */
00778 void CelFileData::ComputeXY(int32_t cellIdx, int16_t& x, int16_t& y)
00779 {
00780         y = (int16_t)(cellIdx/GetCols());
00781         x = (int16_t)(cellIdx - GetCols()*y);
00782 }
00783 
00784 /*
00785  * Find a DataSetHeader by name.
00786  */
00787 DataSetHeader* CelFileData::FindDataSetHeader(const std::wstring& name)
00788 {
00789         DataGroupHeader* dch = genericData.FindDataGroupHeader(CelDataGroupName);
00790         if (dch)
00791         {
00792                 DataSetHeader* dph = genericData.FindDataSetHeader(dch, name);
00793                 if (dph)
00794                         return dph;
00795         }
00796         return 0;
00797 }
00798 
00799 /*
00800  * Return the algorithm parameters.  The algorithm parameter prefix is removed from the name.
00801  */
00802 void CelFileData::GetAlgorithmParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeVector& algParams)
00803 {
00804         // Get all parameters that start with the algorithm parameter prefix
00805         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00806         hdr->GetNameValParamsBeginsWith(ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX, algParams);
00807 
00808         // Remove the prefix from the name
00809         int32_t len = (int32_t)wcslen(ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX);
00810         for (ParameterNameValueTypeIt ii = algParams.begin(); ii != algParams.end(); ++ii)
00811         {
00812                 std::wstring s = ii->GetName();
00813                 s.erase(0, len);
00814                 ii->SetName(s);
00815         }
00816 }
00817 
00818 /*
00819  * Add an algorithm parameter.  The algorithm parameter prefix will be added by the method.
00820  */
00821 void CelFileData::AddAlgorithmParameter(ParameterNameValueType& nvt)
00822 {
00823         std::wstring s = nvt.GetName();
00824         s.insert(0, ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX);
00825         nvt.SetName(s);
00826         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00827         hdr->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00828 }
00829 
00830 /*
00831  * Return an algorithm parameter given a name.
00832  */
00833 bool CelFileData::FindAlgorithmParameter(const std::wstring& name, ParameterNameValueType& param)
00834 {
00835         std::wstring paramName = name;
00836         paramName.insert(0, ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX);
00837         GenericDataHeader* hdr = genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00838         if (hdr->FindNameValParam(paramName, param))
00839         {
00840                 int32_t len = (int32_t)wcslen(ALGORITHM_PARAM_NAME_PREFIX);
00841                 std::wstring s = param.GetName();
00842                 s.erase(0, len);
00843                 param.SetName(s);
00844                 return true;
00845         }
00846         return false;
00847 }
